constituent: threaten, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, power3, muscle3, arnold3
koohiiStory1: Compare the primitive positions of armpit (#870) and threaten (#871). When your triceps rest alongside your body, they fit snugly against your armpit. When you hold them above your body, however, your posture becomes quite threatening.
koohiiStory2: Don´t threaten a warewolf. He´s three times as powerful ON a full moon.　RTK2:　キョウ　脅迫　きょうはく (blackmail)…　Pure Group:　協872.
kunYomi: おびや.かす、おど.す、おど.かす
myStory: bắt nạt, đe doạ. chữ Hiếp. dùng lực tác động phía trên thịt
readingExamples: 脅かす (おど.かす), 脅す (おど.す), 脅かす (おびや.かす)
